snippet.title: Metroid- Other M Live Action Commercial
snippet.description:
Over 1.25 million app downloads! http://bit.ly/MahaloApps
This is a video of the live-action commercial for the Metroid: Other M coming out for the Wii.

Developer: Project M / Nintendo
Release date: August 31, 2010
Platforms: Nintendo Wii

http://www.mahalo.com/metroid-other-m
http://www.mahalo.com/metroid-other-m-walkthrough (less info)
